channel.title: Server connecting problem
channel.description:
Hi, I read the rules and it said that it should be server related, and this IS server related.
When I try to connect to my server, it tries to connect for about 10 sec and then it just gives me "error connecting to server". Someone told me to configure my ip, it didn't do anything. my old comp broke so I got a new one and now this is happening..
On a sidenote, I have vista

item.title: Server connecting problem
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

d-link router[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2009, 01:52:20 pm[/size][hr]Ok I changed my start port 43595 to my end port 43594 gonna check if it works[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2009, 01:55:29 pm[/size][hr]Nope doesn’t work

SOMEONE PLEASE HELP!

Read full topic

item.description:
@airborne wrote:

What kind of router do you have?

item.title: Server connecting problem
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

First I tried portforwarding with utorrent, whenever I try to use 43594 it says port is already in use so I do 43595 and it works and runs but still can’t get in server.

2nd I try it like this:
Windows firewall
Exceptions
Open port 43595
Ok

Same thing happens with the above, it accepts everything but still can’t get in.

Last time I did with router and it worked opened port 43595 with d-link router but still couldn’t get in.

Read full topic

item.title: Server connecting problem

item.description:
@airborne wrote:

Did you port forward and open the port in your computer?
